ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Level 20 HELP!
ygData.msgSnippet: Alteration, definately.  This is taken from http://eq.castersrealm.com/misc/pages/special.asp (the casters realm).... because I could not say it better myself.
ygData.messageBody:
Alteration, definately.  This is taken from http://eq.castersrealm.com/misc/pages/special.asp (the casters realm).... because I could not say it better myself.

Enchanter

Enchanters really only have two choices to go for in specialisation.  These are Alteration and Conjuration.  

Alteration is by far the more popular choice as 80% of enchanter spells are of this nature.  It includes roots, hastes, slows, DoT's, charms, and most buffs and debuffs.  Most enchanters choose this as their field of specialisation.

Conjuration is used for the mesmerisation series of spells.  This is the major use of crowd control in the game.  Some Enchanters once they reach Level 50, complete the quest at the Temple of Sol Ro and switch to this specialisation as they find they are casting more mes-based spells than any other type.  It is really a question of gameplay.

Generally speaking, unless you are very sure, if you are making an Enchanter I recommend you specialise in Alteration.

Cogg - RZ

----- Original Message -----
From: James
To: eqenchanters@egroups.com
Sent: Friday, June 23, 2000 7:34 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Level 20 HELP!

Ok where do I specialize in. I know people have there own thoughts on what to do. If you could please tell me what you think and why. So that way I can make a good choice I wont regret!
 
I will thank you now for your help!
 
bimpul Un'derfoot
